name: I Am The Caretaker
description:
I Am The Caretaker is short horror game. 

Your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies in the monitored rooms. 

Anomalies range from furniture movement to otherworldly intruders. 

When you spot an anomaly all you have to do is file an anomaly report describing the type and location of the anomaly.

You will need sharp eyes and good memory to survive the entire night. 

Are you ready for the task? Game made in a few days as part of the exercises.
Gameplay idea based on I'm on  Observation Duty.
